github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use the format: "<type>(<scope>): <subject>", where <type> is one of the following: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, test, chore, revert, ci. <scope> is the relative path of the package of the main scope of the changes.
Avoid commenting on the content of the files, and instead focus on the changes themselves.
If you need to provide more context, use the body of the commit message.
